articles.title: Jack Dorsey pumps $10 million into a nonprofit focused on open-source social media
articles.description: Jack Dorsey backs nonprofit 'and Other Stuff' with $10M to build open social technology.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Apple News+ adds a new game that uses emoji and Genmoji to sovle puzzles
articles.description: Released to coincide with World Emoji Day, the new Emoji Game is part logic, part word game that's inspired by how we use emojis to communicate.
articles.author: Sarah Perez
